channel.title: How can I add new NPC's with drops?
channel.description:
Help please. How can I add new NPC's with drops?
in autospawn.cfg i can only add NPCs that spawn but where can i add the items they drop?

item.title: How can I add new NPC's with drops?
item.dc:creator: @Hey3 Hey*
item.description:
@Hey3 wrote:

Yes, this server has NPCdrops.cfg.

Do i need to edit something in there?

[code]//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount–
npcdrop = 1 1 6529 3 6529 4 6529 5 6529 6 6529 7 6529 8 6529 9 6529 10 6529 11 6529 12 6529 13 6529 14 6529 15
npcdrop = 1 2 1203 1 882 7 877 1 877 2 877 3
npcdrop = 1 3 1139 1 1137 1
npcdrop = 1 4 557 4 563 1 4278 1 554 6 562 2 558 9
npcdrop = 1 5 199 1 1061 1 313 1 1440 1 1446 1 438 1 436 1 1965 1 2677 1
npcdrop = 3 1 6529 3 6529 4 6529 5 6529 6 6529 7 6529 8 6529 9 6529 10 6529 11 6529 12 6529 13 6529 14 6529 15/code]

Example for the file.[/code]

item.title: How can I add new NPC's with drops?
item.dc:creator: @im_a_beast im a beast
item.description:
@im_a_beast wrote:

rog3r… ur wrong… il tell u whats right… go to npchandler.java and search (use Ctrl F) “ItemHandler.addItem(” until u see something like this
ItemHandler.addItem(6754, npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}
once u did that u will see a npc code on top of all that, all u have to do is change the code of the npc and what item u want it to drop… hope this helped… sorry for not explaining it good, its becuz this is a comment not a TuT gl with what i told u… cya =]

Read full topic
